---
format:
  html:
    embed-resources: true

params:
    image_path : '.'
---

```{r}
#| include: false

library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| output: asis
#| column: screen

gs2_files <- list.files(path = params$image_path, pattern = "*.png")
samples <- str_split_i(gs2_files, "_", 1) %>% 
    str_unique()
for(sample in samples){
    tab_files <- gs2_files[startsWith(gs2_files, sample)]
    cat('### ', sample, '\n\n')
    cat(':::: {.panel-tabset}\n\n')
    for(plot_type in c('linear', 'log', 'transformed_linear', 'transformed_log')){
        cat('## ', plot_type, '\n\n')
        plot <- tab_files[startsWith(tab_files, paste(sample, "_", plot_type, sep = ""))]
        cat('![GenomeScope2 ', plot_type, ' plot](', paste(params$image_path, '/', plot, sep = ""), ')\n\n')
    }
    cat('::::\n\n')
}
```
